Clogherhead can be accessed directly from
by following signposts. it is roughly 10km or a 15 minute drive from Drogheda. Access from
is best using the motorway, taking the south Drogheda exits and continuing as above.

Clogherhead is a busy fishing village along the east coast and the newly developed pier is a must see especially during the summer months where diving and fshing are common activities. The old church ruins and graveyard are a must see.
